title: Cruise Vacations Launch New Chapter With Looser Mask Rules
sub_head: Carnival and Norwegian begin recommending masks instead of requiring them
body:
Major cruise lines including Carnival and Norwegian are loosening onboard mask rules starting Tuesday.
Carnival Cruise Line recommends—but doesn’t require—masks on board starting March 1. The same policy goes for Norwegian Cruise Line ships departing from U.S. ports. Royal Caribbean Cruises relaxed its mask requirements for fully vaccinated guests in February. They are optional for fully vaccinated guests.
